This module provides all high-level API for query and manipulate data

Imports

asyncdispatch, strutils, json, tables, future, ql2, datum, connection, utils, types

Types

RqlDatabase = ref object of RqlQuery
  db: string
  Source 
RqlTable = ref object of RqlQuery
  rdb: RqlDatabase
  table: string
  Source

  firstVar: bool
  Source

proc run(r: RqlQuery; c: RethinkClient = nil): Future[JsonNode] {.raises: [],
    tags: [TimeEffect, WriteIOEffect, ReadIOEffect, RootEffect].}
Run a query on a connection, returning a JsonNode contains single JSON result or an JsonArray, depending on the query.   Source 
proc makeFunc[T](r: T; f: RqlQuery): RqlQuery

Call an anonymous function using return values from other ReQL commands or queries as arguments.

renamed from do function to avoid keyword conflict

  Source 
proc `[]`[T, U](r: T; s: string): U

Operator for create row's fields chain

Example:

r.row["age"]

proc indexDrop(r: RqlTable; t: string): RqlQuery {.raises: [], tags: [].}
Delete a previously created secondary index of this table   Source 
proc indexList(r: RqlTable): RqlQuery {.raises: [], tags: [].}
List all the secondary indexes of this table.   Source 
proc indexRename(r: RqlTable; oldName, newName: string; overwrite = false): RqlQuery {.
    raises: [], tags: [].}
Rename an existing secondary index on a table. If the optional argument overwrite is specified as True, a previously existing index with the new name will be deleted and the index will be renamed. If overwrite is False (the default) an error will be raised if the new index name already exists.   Source 
proc indexStatus(r: RqlTable; names: varargs[string]): RqlQuery {.raises: [], tags: [].}
Get the status of the specified indexes on this table, or the status of all indexes on this table if no indexes are specified.   Source 
proc indexWait(r: RqlTable; names: varargs[string]): RqlQuery {.raises: [], tags: [].}
Wait for the specified indexes on this table to be ready   Source

proc replace(r: RqlQuery; data: MutableDatum; durability = "hard";
            returnChanges = false; nonAtomic = false): RqlQuery {.raises: [], tags: [].}
Replace documents in a table. Accepts a JSON document or a ReQL expression, and replaces the original document with the new one. The new document must have the same primary key as the original document.   Source

    raises: [], tags: [].}

proc getAll[T](r: RqlTable; args: openArray[T]; index = ""): RqlQuery

Get all documents where the given value matches the value of the requested index

Example:

# with primary index
r.table("posts").getAll([1, 1]).run()
# with secondary index
r.table("posts").getAll(["nim", "lang"], "tags").run()
  Source

            leftBound = "closed"; rightBound = "open"): RqlQuery {.raises: [], tags: [].}

proc row[T](r: T): RqlRow

This proc must be called along with [] operator
